changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.resource_location ( id bigserial NOT NULL, resource bigint NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, location bigint NOT NULL, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('NOW'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT resource_location_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT resource_location_location_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_location_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_location_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_location_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_location_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_location_resource_key UNIQUE (resource , relationship , location ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
